creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text: Note should go someplace before user reaches download listing and on related how-to pages.

creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text:
Created attachment 15323
Provides short info that source version is required for deploying pub

Changes http://lenya.apache.org/1_2_x/installation/index.html

creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text:
Created attachment 15324
Update to src-install instructions

- Mention that jdk 1.4.1 is ok, too
(http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/lenya-user/200506.mbox/%3c42A36D81.5010803@apache.org%3e)

- change subversion links to
http://lenya.apache.org/1_2_x/installation/subversion.html
- update link to FAQ which was moved from wiki to website according to wiki

Created attachment 15325
Update deploy-pub how-to: src version required

Updates http://lenya.apache.org/1_2_x/how-to/deploy_publication.html to mention
that the src version of lenya is required.
